description:
Just when you thought Mondays couldn't get any worse...

You're used to the odd marital spat in this town, that much was normal. But when something like that escalates into flat out murder - well, nobody wants to deal with that, do they. However the more you look into it, the less this seems like the open-and-shut case you thought it was...

1971 is a 3D, first-person detective game in which players navigate a crime scene in an attempt to decipher what led to a tragic murder. Search for clues around the environment and collate your photographs on the whiteboard to try and solve the murder - just remember not to trust everything you're told.

*Please keep in mind that this is only a prototype made as part of a class & may be worked on more in the future. Controls -

Move - W,A,S,D

Examine Objects - Left Mouse Button

Take Photo - Right Mouse Button

Exit Examine Mode - E

Interact With Whiteboard - E

Exit Game - Esc
